sentences.en: ...a perfect meld of art and social comment.
sentences.cn: ...一种艺术与社会评论的完美融合。

sentences.en: After meld mother pulls the tablecloth over the table.
sentences.cn: 饭后,妈妈把桌布蒙在桌子上.

sentences.en: Current emphasis is on continuous improvement in the MELD - based allocation scheme.
sentences.cn: 目前的重点集中于继续改善以MELD为基础的分配方案.

sentences.en: He attempts to meld the other two steel plants into his.
sentences.cn: 他企图吞并另外两家钢厂.

sentences.en: MELD score and clinical type predict prognosis in hepatorenal syndrome: relevance to lier transplantation.
sentences.cn: 题目:MELD评分及临床类型预测肝肾综合症的预后: 同肝移植的相关性.

sentences.en: Methods Literatures of MELD applied in LT retrospectively.
sentences.cn: 方法回顾性分析MELD在肝移植应用中的有关文献.

sentences.en: Shanghai is a meld of the very old and the very new.
She sang the first verse again, listening to the way the words melded with the music.
sentences.cn: 她再次吟咏了第一节，倾听着歌词与音乐的交融。

trans.tran_en: A meld of things is a mixture or combination of them that is useful or pleasant
if two things meld, or if you meld them, they combine into one thing
